body_html:
Also, it looks like the format of the FixedLengthRecord now accepts hop_bytes (added in another PR). This may complicate the processing for non-seekable files (like gzip/zlib).

I will take a closer look and see what we could do to handle hop_bytes as well.
body_text:
Also, it looks like the format of the FixedLengthRecord now accepts hop_bytes (added in another PR). This may complicate the processing for non-seekable files (like gzip/zlib).
I will take a closer look and see what we could do to handle hop_bytes as well.
body:
Also, it looks like the format of the `FixedLengthRecord` now accepts `hop_bytes` (added in another PR). This may complicate the processing for non-seekable files (like gzip/zlib).

I will take a closer look and see what we could do to handle `hop_bytes` as well.
